description: In 2004 the Champaign IL hired a professional surveying firm to accurately locate city owned survey monuments throughout the area.  Notes: Horizontal Datum – NAD 83 (1997) Illinois State Plane, East Zone, Feet; Vertical Datum – NAVD 1988, Feet
